tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE carbon_footprint_calculations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  food_product_name VARCHAR(255),
  ingredients TEXT,
  production_method VARCHAR(100),
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE food_products ( 
	id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
	product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	ingredient_id INT NOT NULL, 
	method_id INT NOT NULL, 
	FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(id), 
	FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES production_methods(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE product_ingredients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    ingredient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES food_products(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE food_products (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  ingredient_id INT REFERENCES ingredients(id),
  method_id INT REFERENCES production_methods(id),
  quantity INT
);
